comments.body: Website;- the user interface is pleasing to the eye- Navigation is very easy to understand- Mobile-friendly- Fast website loadingGames;- A complete selection of games, starting from slot games, casino, live casino, sports, esport, poker, etc- Complete slot providers, such as pragmatic play, Betoontruk, KA Gaming, BGaming, Playstar, Red Rake, etc.- Has a lot of bonus offersDeposit;- Have adequate crypto deposit options- Need to add another crypto option for depositAdvantages ; Vbetftn is a simple and easy to use site. the game that is owned is very complete. easy registration and good navigationDisadvantages ; I didn't find much to be Disadvantages, but adding a crypto option for deposits seemed like something to think aboutUser ID:Â  1404930351

comments.author: worldofcoins
comments.body: Advantages:1- There are a wide variety of games on the website. For me, league of legends is what i looked for and found it in esports (it's a plus that you guys have esports)2- The website is easy to navigate through to find what game, game event you're looking for.3- The website's design is also good, with plenty of eye candy for lovers of beautiful design.Disadvantages:There aren't many disadvantages, but the ones from my point of view are.- Website after login is laggy and relatively slow.- While registering, I had to face confirming password issue (Where I can't paste the password which was around 20-30 characters, you should enable paste password on confirm your password)User ID: 1404028720

comments.author: GxSTxV
comments.body: It's great to see more casinos that genuinely care about their customers and joined us also on Bitcointalk community. After spending some time on your platform I would like to share my review:Advantages I noticed:Vbet casino offers a variety of games including slots sports betting and online poker which is a unique feature not found in many other casinos and i like it.you provide five membership plans ranging from bronze to diamond adding excitement and makes a challenge for players to reach higher levels beside the benefits of each level.The deposit bonuses offered are good with clearly stated requirements.The no deposit fees and low withdrawal fees for various cryptocurrenciesin addition to FTN.Providing live chat support which is essential in every live casino.You have a low x1 requirement for withdrawing normal deposits that don't include bonuses.Disadvantages and recommended features:Everything look so good and hard to find disadvantages honestly since that Vbet casino offers and fill all the needs of any regular gamblers and provides a good betting environment I would like to suggest some additional features that can make it even better Introducing a vault feature where gamblers can transfer their extra balance would be a great addition imo.Adding a tipping feature for friends who have Vbet accounts would also be good.Including the latest bets from users , highest wins and multiplayer options would provide more engagement and excitement for gamblersUser id: 1405255910

comments.author: Cointxz
comments.body: Pros:The casino offers various games which is not available on on other casino. Iâ€™m surprised on the 1creedroomz live casino provider which is my first time to see for my long years of active playing on live casino. The bonuses wagering requirements is very fair and the FTN value is always available on the top part as reference for the balance since itâ€™s the default currency on the casino..This casino offers almost complete set of casino games including a DEX which is available on the top part. The UI/UX design is premium which makes me interested to browse more on the casino features.Cons:Thereâ€™s no feature to change into different currency aside from the default FTN. Games should be separated properly based on their category, Iâ€™m on live casino page but still Iâ€™m seeing matches of sports book. The promotional banner on the top makes the games load slower because they are everywhere. You should separate announcements page to the games to make it easier to load.Lastly, make the games category button larger so that user can easily change game category. The button is very small for mobile user which makes me wrong click many times.UserID: 1383952696

comments.author: Haunebu
comments.body: Review:Pros:- Stylish and slick design. Loved the entire pink interface and the animations made everything a lot more lively.- The FAQ section answers almost all essential queries which is uncommon in the crypto gambling world.- Plethora of welcome bonus promotions which are quite appealing if I may say so.- Decent loyalty program to keep you coming back for more.Cons:- KYC confusion! Passport is mandatory in FAQ, but it supposedly isn't according to the manager.- Vig on some sports market odds is a bit too high.- Laggy at times on mobile and desktop. Also, site doesn't load properly sometimes.Overall, initial impressions were great, but the site clearly still has a lot of room for improvement.UID: 1439968848

comments.author: Woodie
comments.created_time: June 05, 2023, 08:36:48 PMLast edit: June 05, 2023, 08:48:14 PM by Woodie
comments.body: Decided to give vbetFTN a test run after realizing that its not limited to casino players but sports enthusiasts & pundits can jump on board.So from my visit of the platform this is what I found on the platform :Everyone that has visted vbetFTN will agree that the user interface with vbetFTN is smooth and fast, no glitches or slowness experienced. And for casino colors , the dull side of things is something to like Â but others might want some kind of toggle button to play around with the brightness and the alike, but regardless whats there still works.One aspect that pulls a crowd when it comes to gambling comes in the form of bonuses, and vbetFTN isn't short of these though I feel they should have spiced up the bonuses from the usual deposit bonuses and add bonuses such as Friday reload bonus, etc and more bonuses will be nice for the sportsbook as more of these lean towars the casino.Noticed the platform has an inhouse currency called FTN which is great but from the home page it shows there is an external platform that you can exchanhe these coins and its a no no for me as this should have been done inhouse!Casino looks well equipped with the most popular games around, can't really complain here, and most of the best game providers are supported here which is a big plus I like the choice of coins supported here, as they do not attract high transaction fees nor do you need to wait the whole day to get your coins deposited, another big plusMy only concerns and recommendations KYC doesnt seem to be mentioned anywhere when registering, and prefer knowing the standing on this from the on set to avoid future hurdlesAdd some kind of sportsbook banner to let everyone know vbetFTN offers this as currently its a small button at the top that directs you to this and can easily be missed**guess its glued on the header**"Only FTN wallet deposits qualify for this offer." I find this to be a restriction on my side as getting the FTN coin might be a stretch and would prefer using a coin I feel comfortable with, but I get this is done to promote your coin and get demand going, but perhaps have this at 150% bonus and any coin deposit can be set at 100% and user should do the math of what benefits them the most..All in all great platform, should be visiting this place as I have liked the markets available on the sportsbook and hope cashouts are generous and don't lock out early.User id: 1448048609

comments.author: loveurself420
comments.body: Here is my review and what i noticed after signing up for your casino:Advantages :Beautiful and smooth design on mobile and Iâ€™m a mobile user.Variety of games, sport betting, slots which is a very important advantage that any gambler need and should find in one casinoPlenty of promotions and bonuses with reasonable requirementsAccepting several currencies for deposits and withdrawals with low minimum amount.Cons:I couldnâ€™t change the main currency to USD for example, itâ€™s stuck on FTNNot offering the vault feature to transfer funds and save themI couldnâ€™t find also the self exclusion features for gamblers which is an important thing in every casinoUID: 1459206555

comments.author: Sarah Azhari
comments.body: Here my reviewI am happy to see your site have 2fa where I think you care about security user. but, when I 1st timed look at that, your 2fa seem only able for Google authenticator, which in fact can be used also another application 2fa like Authy. Maybe better to add or change that information to be general.I always check available language when 1st time visit the casino site, but I can't see my local language there, maybe next you must think to adding it soon because Indonesia is one of the most player gambling here.Is Bitcoin wallet address always changing when depositing?, because when I read the deposit page the "One-time wallet address" appears.So far, the pink color and dark theme make my eyes comfortable to play games for a long time
